i dont expect anyone to go on every single media announcing such a tease after a meeting i would think that with the amount of times this will occur you(plural) will find it annoying and start complaining about flooding the forum with meaningless announcements (i have to stay on topic more). on this occasion it's totally fine to get on the easiest platform to post these short teases and not just flood the forum with them- if it conjures up enough interest it will find itself into the forums- i havnt seen that every single one of max's tweets go on here.
If it's in a special part of the forums no one need be annoyed at all, they just don't have to go there. Now, if they're crapping up General with Max's general Twitter ramblings, I'd have a problem. And the suitability of a certain platform for certain types of announcements/media/whatever is definitely up to personal belief and not at all set in stone. Twitter, IMO, is utterly useless as a conversation platform and even as an announcement platform. Forum software like this is much more flexible.
